jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Key Technical Skills:  Linux (openWRT) Kernel / system programming, C, Python, Device Driver programming, Networking, LTE, WiFi

  • Extremely proficient with Linux and Linux systems knowledge, system libraries, and system and network configuration and debugging.
  • Maintain and build system software including Operating Systems, drivers, kernel configuration and build scripts
  • Help maintain and develop system software in Python and C for our SD-WAN platform.
  • Develop new Platform and Linux system features and services for SASE Mobile Edge,
  • SASE Mobile edge will be ruggedized HW version of existing   SASE Edge
  • Work involves porting of OpenWRT and SASE firmware and software on new HW model. 
  • Provide support for LTE and WIfi drivers.
